__e: Today a friend of mine who recently survived a cancer scare said,
There's nothing worse for a guy who beat cancer than to come up against a fight he can't quite win.
Why didn't you tell me yesterday That this mugger's latest victims Were a couple traveling through los angeles
There's nothing worse for a guy who beat cancer than to come up against a fight he can't quite win.
What about the time you guys took down the firelord?
"and unseats the greatest evil the realm has ever seen."
For once, we didn't give in to her guilt!
All I know is that there's good guys and bad guys, and today, your people put the bad ones in the ground.
Son, have I ever told you the tale of the time I brought down the London Five?
He can't be won by sheer force, eh?
An evil may not be driven out with an even greater evil.
No, I just don't like being beaten by a thing, that's all.
Yeah. I was definitely hoping... Well, he was trying to tell me that...
My kin is your father, who imagined we saw off death.
And, Ed. Ed, you have conquered your anger enough to get back together with your wife.

You have never defeated me in anything.
